evaluation.questionText: Which of the following items falls under the responsibility of the Hiring Manager?
evaluation.instructionText: Choose the best answer, then select Submit.

feedback.feedbackText:

Posting the job vacancy and submitting the official offer both fall under the Human Resources Office’s responsibilities.
